DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Acupuncture Electroacupuncture Patients With Chronic Nonspecific Low Back Pain : Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVE : To compare effect acupuncture electroacupuncture alternative therapy patient chronic low back pain able identify whether electroacupuncture benefit acupuncture treatment low back pain widespread scientific . METHOD : Sixty subject randomize two group : Group Acupuncture treatment low back pain ( AG ) Group Acupuncture use electroacupuncture ( EG ) . The primary clinical outcome pain , assess numerical pain scale McGill Pain Questionnaire disability assess Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire . Secondary outcomes measure global perception scale global perceived effect , quality life use Short-Form Health Survey questionnaire ( SF-36 ) , Beck Depression ( Beck Depression Inventory BDI ) , Flexibility , kinesiophobia bank Wells . The group treat two weekly session last hour , 6 week , total 12 session . The outcome achieve final initial rating six month treatment completion . Data collect blind examiner also make allocation patient group .
